ONLINE ORDERS ARE 100% SECURE
Main Menu Fast Food Trays Compartment Trays Cambro Cam covers Serving Trays Piper Tray Dispensers Sheet Pans Serving Containers Purchase Products in Shopping Cart Track Your Order About Us Equipment Sites Contact Us
Fast Food Trays
Manufactured for durability to withstand frequent use in quick serve operations. Even though their cost is low, quality is high. The attractive textured surface hides scratches and provides an extra grip to keep glasses and dishware from slipping. Available in a wide variety of contemporary colors, to fit any decor.
If this item is in-stock will be shipped within 24 hours! Click here for shipping and stock information
Product Features:
Fast food trays Colors: Desert Tan (104), Light Peach (106), Peal Gray (107), Primrose Yellow (108), Black (110), Sherwood Green (119), Red (163), Orange (166), Brown (167), Blue (168), Navy Blue (186), Blush (409), Teal (414), Cranberry (416).
NOTE: Cambro Fast Food Trays MUST be purchased in case packs
